price: Njemu se mole oni koji su na nebesima i na Zemlji; svakog časa On se zanima nečim,
arabic: يَسۡـَٔلُهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ كُلَّ يَوۡمٍ هُوَ فِي شَأۡنٖ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yasaluhu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi kulla yawmin huwa fī shanin
